title: Harden auth flow for internet exposure

reviews.body:
VERDICT: REQUEST_CHANGES

Thanks for the hardening work here—overall direction is strong, but I found two blocking issues:

1) CSRF cookie lifetime effectively disables long-lived refresh sessions
2) Existing refresh sessions are broken after deploy (NULL binding mismatch)

Happy to re-review once these are addressed.

body: Harden auth flow for internet exposure. Fixes #68
